phrase.item: May you always be young oh flower, may you never wither and die oh flower.
You are young today, so enjoy it. Then you won't have any desire left oh flower.
Don't go after what you haven't done, don't go after strangers.
Don't go after a bad partner.
Never listen to enemies, never argue with them.
Without love life has no meaning, if you are in love, love [your lover].
